hey prashant i had a question there is this guy on 1337 rapid ripper who does brrip at 350 and 480p..
his quality is excellant.. i always thought brrip or hd was only 720p and above but his screenshots are also great so im confused which is better 480p or 720p ripped from same blu ray source considering size and quality??

^ Bluray r originally 720p & 1080p ... but brrip is an encoded Bluray Rip.. so it can be encoded in any vertical resolution...
be it 480p, 352p or even 272p.. 
Quality... it depends on Video Bitrate... 
With same Video Bitrate... the file with lower resolution will have more Quality :D
